name: PerchPeek
slogan: A Rental Marketplace powered by AI
description:
We're a Rental Marketplace where Agent/s Landlords post their properties and Tenants search for them. We look to do two things:

1) Speed up Search - Using Machine Learning to recommend and learn what properties are appropriate for which Tenants. Currently, property search is completely non-dynamic leading to a very long search period (40 hours on average)

2) End-to-end onboarding - you can do all your searching, offers, references and contracts all within the PerchPeek platform meaning there are no more dodgy deposits, crazy contract clauses or ropey references. 

Check out the website now.

jobs.title: Biz Dev Intern
jobs.description:
Who are PerchPeek?
Have you ever tried to rent a property before? Great, then you know the problem we’re trying to solve. On average, Tenants spend c.40 hours searching for properties and it’s a frustrating, manual and offline process. Our fundamental belief is that we can use technology to make renting faster, more secure and potentially even fun. To fulfil this belief, we’re building the Go-To Marketplace for renting properties.

We launched in Q4 2018 and have already attracted thousands of customers in our first few months. For more information about our platform, check us out at www.perchpeek.com. We’re looking to hire two Biz Dev interns to accelerate our mission of making renting as easy as humanly possible. Initially the internships will be for three months but there’s the possibility of both roles evolving into full time positions. This is an opportunity to join us at the start of our journey - we’re (VC) funded, fun and ready to scale.

Role objectives:
Be in charge of ensuring we have enough properties for our wonderful tenants to search through!
Recruit and onboard new Property Suppliers (Agents and Landlord) onto the PerchPeek platform
To be a PerchPeek Ambassador and feedback collector with these Suppliers. We’ll want your opinion on all things from pricing to feature development
Establish a scalable process for prioritising which Suppliers to reach out to
Establish a scalable process for monitoring the supply of properties on the platform 
Set up reporting on the health of our properties pipeline
Dabble in other other areas that interest you. As a small Startup, one of the joys is there’s lots to do. From Marketing to Strategy to Operations, there’s scope to explore areas of the business that interest you


Required Skills and Qualifications
Hustle
Demonstrated track record of success in sales or negotiation with experience in management consulting, account management or product marketing roles preferred
Excellent written and verbal communication skills with the ability to explain complex concepts in a simple manner
Ability to work with wide range of people at all decision-making levels and understand what motivates them
Strong team-playing skills
A business focused way of thinking and a strong hands-on, results-driven mentality
Advanced computer skills (Excel, Word, Outlook, PowerPoint)
Educated to at least degree level or compensating work experience


What are the PerchPerks?
Beyond being surrounded by stuffed parrots every day?

Experience growing an early stage startup
Work with a strong Founding Team that care about culture
Autonomy in defining your working objectives
Unlimited holiday 
Free breakfast
Team days
Friday socials
Free stuffed Perchies (parrots)
Parrot themed games
